title: Why do some players confuse juggernauts with tanks?
body: They are 2 different classes, one has mid to high damage with little cc and the other has low damage with high cc. They are both very tanky however.

replies.body: Because anyone who's hard as fuck to kill is normally called a tank.

"Hey guys, lets give tanks uber damage"

"but the players will say its unfair and tanks are OP!"

"I got an idea, lets call them 'juggernauts', theyll never know"

"Brilliant!"
When you think of a tank u think of someone with like 4k hp
BEcause, either way.... in the mids of battle, we are still doing damage. like Sion, oooow beautiful sion. you getz the best of both worlds with him. Dat boi over der is a real one :)
Because to a lot of people health builder = tank.
